name: Time Drives By
description: Initially inspired by Frogger, Braid and Super Hot, but we went a different direction from there. You play as a car, moving forward in a grid of streets and there are many other cars moving along with you. You use time bombs to slow down or speed up cars- and if you crash, you can turn back time! (Think Doctor Stranger's Time Stone or Hermione's Time Turner from Harry Potter, if they were both stuck in traffic )
